song.title: Douchebag Rumble
song.info:
I'm so psyched to present my brand new chiptune track called "Douchebag Rumble", which is the first single from my upcoming album Superposition.
The album is set to be released in late January (or early February), including many never before released tracks as "Chasing The Clouds", "Ms. Bed Burrito", "The Lonesome Droid" and more.
Now it's officially xmas and I hope you're all having great 8-bit holiday. As it is xmas and all I've decided to give you this download for free!
Hope you like it and please don't act like a douche on xmas :)
Comments and shares are welcome, cheers /Zalza
Artwork: (c) Emilia Forrest 2014
